text: The Perija's stream tree frog (Hyloscirtus japreria) is a frog. It lives in Venezuela and Colombia. Scientists have seen it between 1430 and 1832 meters above sea level. It lives on the west side of the Andes Mountains. It lives in cloud forests. ==First paper== * ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Hyloscirtus japreria
